attributes.action: Graded Listing system for Historic Vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is currently no recognition of the historic importance of Britains rich historic vehicular heritage.  We submit that such a system is required to safeguard the nations rich vehicular heritage in the long term.
A grading system to differentiate between the vitally important (grade 1) and other lesser important vehicles (grade 2 and lower grades) to show how important each individual vehicle is to the national vehicular heritage, to try to safeguard the vehicles longterm future preservation.  Such a system should include ALL categories of Motor Vehicle including Cars, Trucks, Motorcycles etc.  Should also include Ships, Aircraft, Rail etc.
